ing: 1/2 cup instant Swiss-style hot chocolate mix
des:
"This is a very nice, sweet Christmas or holiday drink that's been in my family for a while.
 It's very easy, only using four ingredients and can serve the whole family!"
ins: Place marshmallows, ice cubes, hot chocolate mix, milk, and sugar in a blender; blend until evenly mixed. Pour into 4 glasses to serve.
